name: 3D Railway Run Surfers Adventure Game
description:
Subway Run Castle Surfers
Subway Run Castle Surfers is an adventure and endless running game in the castle, Dino is following you in this Subway Run game and your missions to protect himself from dino and the hurdles in the running path. Download this Subway Run Castle Surfers free today and Run Fast as you can in the castle and earn more and more coins. Avoid from hurdles in the run path. In this Subway Castle Run you must need to conquer the castle by running fast as you can and protect from the hurdles. Jump, Slide, Sidestep and flat out run away in this all 3D endless fun running game.
Endless Running path and obstacles
Run as much as Possible
Explore the Castle and beware from the obstacles
Collect Coins, Touch the Screen anywhere to Jump and hold to fly
Tap to Jump
Simple Tilt and Swipe controls
Fun and Addictive game play
Enjoy this awesome, beautiful and adventure running game. This is Free for all enjoy the endless running. Exciting game play will take you busy all the time play this subway surfers run castle game and enjoy on this weekend.
This furious Running game gives you many hours of nonstop gaming fun. If you have any suggestions or ideas to improve this Subway Run Castles Surfers game, Please share with us, we will try our best to improve this game in future.
Thanks a lot!
